Text.Page:
Our worst nightmares came to pass when the honored dead of our past came back to stalk us in the present. We need to send them back to the dark, before they become too numerous and overrun us.

I've got a few volunteers waiting at the edge of town. Take one and work your way through Berzerad Cemetery. Kill what you must but come back safelyâ€”both of you.
I'll do my best. Just don't leave me, okay?

Your efforts likely saved the town, if not the entire region. And you helped one of our volunteers gain some badly needed experience.

Good work, soldier.
